entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:19 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.2°C

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 1:09 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 1:09 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
